articles.author: Brian Fung
articles.title: Elon Musk says he will step down as Twitter CEO — once he finds a replacement - CNN
articles.description: Twitter owner Elon Musk confirmed Tuesday evening he will step down as the company's CEO, but only when he identifies a successor, directly addressing for the first time a Twitter poll he created this week in which millions of users voted for his ouster.

articles.author: Nick Paton Walsh, Sarah Dean
articles.title: Russia's militarization of the Arctic shows no sign of slowing down - CNN
articles.description: Russia has continued expanding its military bases in the Arctic region despite significant losses in its war on Ukraine, according to a new series of satellite images obtained by CNN.
articles.content:

articles.title: After convicting Harvey Weinstein of rape, a Los Angeles jury deadlocks on factors that could have increased his sentence - CNN
articles.description: After convicting former film producer Harvey Weinstein of rape and sexual assault, a Los Angeles jury could not reach a unanimous verdict Tuesday on alleged aggravating factors that could have increased his sentence.

articles.title: Exclusive: Trump's former White House ethics lawyer told Cassidy Hutchinson to give misleading testimony to January 6 committee, sources say - CNN
articles.description: The January 6 committee made a startling allegation on Monday, claiming it had evidence that a Trump-backed attorney urged a key witness to mislead the committee about details they recalled.
